channel.title: Password Stealing?
channel.description: Hi guys, i played a server a while-back and a bunch of hackers managed to find the password list to the server, they said the passwords weren't hex'd or whatever, but what confuses me is how they were able to maintain the password list? anyone got an idea how?

item.title: Password Stealing?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Most likely they somehow hacked the owner (or the owner sold or the hacker was the owner itself) and got the server character files, and they weren’t encrypted/hashed. However, this topic sounds a lot like you just want to know how to modify the client to steal passwords and we don’t condone that here.

Read full topic
